title: Scroll
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Scroll

Scroll may refer to:

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

  • Clue scroll, a possible drop from monsters and pickpocketed H.A.M. Members
  • Teleport scrolls, rewards from completing a Treasure Trail
    • Digsite teleport
    • Iorwerth camp teleport
    • Feldip hills teleport
    • Lumberyard teleport
    • Lunar isle teleport
    • Mort'ton teleport
    • Mos le'harmless teleport
    • Nardah teleport
    • Pest control teleport
    • Piscatoris teleport
    • Tai bwo wannai teleport

Quests[edit | edit source]

  • Ardougne teleport scroll, a reward from the Plague City quest that unlocks the Ardougne Teleport spell
  • Spell scroll, a reward from the Watchtower quest that unlocks Watchtower Teleport spell
  • Enchanted scroll, an item used in the Client of Kourend quest
  • Animate rock scroll, an item used in the One Small Favour quest
  • Scroll (Royal Trouble), an item used in the Royal Trouble quest
  • Scroll (Making History), an item used in the Making History quest
  • Tattered scroll, an item used in the Shilo Village quest
  • Crumpled scroll, an item used in the Shilo Village quest
  • Scroll (Elemental Workshop II), an item used in the Elemental Workshop II quest

Other[edit | edit source]

  • Champion scroll, a very rare drop from various monsters
  • Impling scroll, a tool to aid players in the Impetuous Impulses minigame
  • Prayer scroll, a scroll received as a possible reward from raids that allows the player to unlock certain prayers when read
  • Scroll, a scroll used to construct a team during the Barbarian Assault Minigame.


 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.

{{External|rs}}
'''Scroll''' may refer to:

===Treasure Trails===
*[[Clue scroll]], a possible drop from monsters and pickpocketed [[H.A.M. Member]]s
*[[Teleport scrolls]], rewards from completing a [[Treasure Trail]]
**[[Digsite teleport]]
**[[Iorwerth camp teleport]]
**[[Feldip hills teleport]]
**[[Lumberyard teleport]]
**[[Lunar isle teleport]]
**[[Mort'ton teleport]]
**[[Mos le'harmless teleport]]
**[[Nardah teleport]]
**[[Pest control teleport]]
**[[Piscatoris teleport]]
**[[Tai bwo wannai teleport]]

===Quests===
*[[Ardougne teleport scroll]], a reward from the [[Plague City]] quest that unlocks the [[Ardougne Teleport]] spell
*[[Spell scroll]], a reward from the [[Watchtower]] quest that unlocks [[Watchtower Teleport]] spell
*[[Enchanted scroll]], an item used in the [[Client of Kourend]] quest
*[[Animate rock scroll]], an item used in the [[One Small Favour]] quest
*[[Scroll (Royal Trouble)]], an item used in the [[Royal Trouble]] quest
*[[Scroll (Making History)]], an item used in the [[Making History]] quest
*[[Tattered scroll]], an item used in the [[Shilo Village]] quest
*[[Crumpled scroll]], an item used in the [[Shilo Village]] quest
*[[Scroll (Elemental Workshop II)]], an item used in the [[Elemental Workshop II]] quest

===Other===
*[[Champion scroll]], a very rare drop from various monsters
*[[Impling scroll]], a tool to aid players in the [[Impetuous Impulses]] minigame
*[[Prayer scroll]], a scroll received as a possible reward from [[raids]] that allows the player to unlock certain [[prayers]] when read
*[[Scroll (Barbarian Assault)|Scroll]], a scroll used to construct a team during the Barbarian Assault Minigame.
